content: of your hood sewing make ch10 to unite the two grannies on the left and right side e try your balaclava you can add more chains if you need to the stitch count will be 60 plus x number of chains made 7 granny balaclava evolution pattern by ra in crochet your balaclavaisalmostready to wear nowyouhaveto make the ribbings startingfrom the bottom work alwayson the rightside bottom round 1 ch2 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet all around slip_stitch 70 st you have to double_crochet on the 10ch that you madetojointhegrannysquares seepreviouspage round2 ch2 alternatefpdcandbpdcallaround slip_stitch round3 ch2 fpdcinfpdcofpreviousroundandbpdcinbpdcof previousround slip_stitch round4-14 ch2 fpdcinfpdcofpreviousroundandbpdc inbpdcofpreviousround slip_stitch edging ifyoulike youcanaddmoreroundsuntilyourneckwillbewarmenough hood round1 ch2 countsasfirstdc dcallaround slip_stitch 74st besuretomake adcontheconjunctionbetweenthesquares round2 ch2 alternatefpdcandbpdcallaround slip_stitch round3 ch2 fpdcinfpdcofpreviousroundandbpdcinbpdcofpreviousround slip_stitch ifyoulike youcanaddmorerounds granny balaclava evolution pattern by ra in crochet 8 …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… notes …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… …………………………………………………………………………………………… ………………………………………………………………… 9 granny balaclava evolution pattern by ra in crochet
